data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 5, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Juarez.

Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In Ciudad Juarez, Claudio Baeza (Necaxa) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Juarez.

A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.

Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Necaxa throw-in in Juarez's half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 20, Necaxa's Joao Rodriguez has been booked in Ciudad Juarez.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 25, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.

Juarez to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.

Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
Juarez have a dangerous throw-in.

Free kick Necaxa.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Necaxa.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Necaxa's David Cabrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa pushes forward through Lucas Passerini, whose finish on goal is saved.

In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 45, Luis Lopez (Juarez) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, Flavio Santos is booked for the home team.
The second half has started at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Eryc Castillo is replacing Flavio Santos for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 47, Attention is being given to Juarezâ€™s Brian Rubio and play has been suspended briefly.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Brian Rubio returns to the field for Juarez after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 49, The home team have replaced Mauro Fernandez with Javier Nevarez. This is the second substitution made today by Gabriel Caballero.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 52, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Juarez.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ricardo Chavez (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Penalty! Fernando Hernandez Gomez points to the spot, great chance for Juarez...
Jairo Gonzalez for Necaxa has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 61, Eryc Castillo (Juarez) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Eryc Castillo is on target to give Juarez a 1-0 advantage.
Luis Lopez (Juarez) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.

In the minute 67, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.

Necaxa needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) is making a first substitution, with Martin Barragan replacing David Cabrera.

Luis Alfonso Sosa (Necaxa) is making a fourth change, with Oscar Millan replacing the possibly injured Ricardo Chavez.
Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez with Ian Gonzalez replacing Maximiliano Salas.

In Ciudad Juarez Necaxa drive forward through Juan Delgado. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Ciudad Juarez Necaxa attack through Jose Cobian. The finish is off target, however.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.

The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
